title: 7's
description: A pretty girl, Tamura Nagisaki, appears before an ordinary high school boy. When she says, "Will you protect me?", his ordinary life is thrown into a tailspin. The pleasure killer, Dimensional Rider, kills Nagisaki without a motive. With Nagisaki's death, time between the two loops back and forth. Can the two escape the carnage and infinite loops...?

matches.title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Daiyonshou - Seiiki to Gouyoku no Majou
